languages.text: "Если вы и правда меня отпускаете... Не утруждайтесь повторять дважды. Я больше не доставлю проблем. Не вам". {n}Элина бросает гневный взгляд на Кассию и регента Ааронто.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Если вы и правда меня отпускаете... Не утруждайтесь повторять дважды. Я больше не доставлю проблем. Не вам". {n}Элина бросает гневный взгляд на Кассию и регента Ааронто.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "If you are truly letting me go... There is no need to say it twice. I will no longer cause any trouble. Not to you, at least." {n}Elina glares at Cassia and Aaronto.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "If you are truly letting me go... There is no need to say it twice. I will no longer cause any trouble. Not to you, at least." {n}Elina glares at Cassia and Aaronto.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: “如果您真的愿意放我走……不必多言，我不会再惹任何麻烦，至少不会再给您惹任何麻烦。”{n}埃琳娜瞪着卡西娅与阿伦托。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you are truly letting me go... There is no need to say it twice. I will no longer cause any trouble. Not to you, at least." {n}Elina glares at Cassia and Aaronto.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “如果您真的愿意放我走……不必多言，我不会再惹任何麻烦，至少不会再给您惹任何麻烦。”{n}埃琳娜瞪着卡西娅与阿伦托。{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: «Si de verdad me deja ir... no hace falta que lo repita. No causaré más problemas. Bueno, no se los causaré a usted, al menos». {n}Elina fulmina a Cassia y Aaronto con la mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you are truly letting me go... There is no need to say it twice. I will no longer cause any trouble. Not to you, at least." {n}Elina glares at Cassia and Aaronto.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Si de verdad me deja ir... no hace falta que lo repita. No causaré más problemas. Bueno, no se los causaré a usted, al menos». {n}Elina fulmina a Cassia y Aaronto con la mirada.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: 「本当に私を見逃してくれるなら…二度も言う必要はないわ。もう迷惑はかけない。少なくともあなたには」{n}エリナはカシアとアーロントを睨みつける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you are truly letting me go... There is no need to say it twice. I will no longer cause any trouble. Not to you, at least." {n}Elina glares at Cassia and Aaronto.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「本当に私を見逃してくれるなら…二度も言う必要はないわ。もう迷惑はかけない。少なくともあなたには」{n}エリナはカシアとアーロントを睨みつける。{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr mich wirklich gehen lasst ... müsst Ihr das nicht zweimal sagen. Ich werde keinen Ärger mehr machen. Zumindest nicht Euch." {n}Elina wirft einen Blick auf Cassia und Aaronto.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you are truly letting me go... There is no need to say it twice. I will no longer cause any trouble. Not to you, at least." {n}Elina glares at Cassia and Aaronto.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr mich wirklich gehen lasst ... müsst Ihr das nicht zweimal sagen. Ich werde keinen Ärger mehr machen. Zumindest nicht Euch." {n}Elina wirft einen Blick auf Cassia und Aaronto.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: « Vous me laissez vraiment partir... ? Très bien, je ne me le ferai pas dire deux fois. Je ne causerai plus de problèmes. Du moins, pas à vous, » {n}précise Élina en jetant un coup d'œil éloquent à Cassia et Aaronto.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you are truly letting me go... There is no need to say it twice. I will no longer cause any trouble. Not to you, at least." {n}Elina glares at Cassia and Aaronto.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous me laissez vraiment partir... ? Très bien, je ne me le ferai pas dire deux fois. Je ne causerai plus de problèmes. Du moins, pas à vous, » {n}précise Élina en jetant un coup d'œil éloquent à Cassia et Aaronto.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Beni gerçekten serbest bırakacaksanız tekrar etmeye gerek yok. Bir daha sorun çıkarmayacağım. En azından size." {n}Elina, Cassia ile Aaronto'ya bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you are truly letting me go... There is no need to say it twice. I will no longer cause any trouble. Not to you, at least." {n}Elina glares at Cassia and Aaronto.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Beni gerçekten serbest bırakacaksanız, ikinci kez söylemenize gerek yok. Bir daha sorun çıkarmayacağım. Size çıkarmayacağım en azından." {n}Elina, Cassia'ya ve Aaronto'ya bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader
